whitepaper.title: WHITE PAPER v1.0
whitepaper.subtitle: ATF Protocol
whitepaper.desc_short: A New Way to Buy and Sell Fine Wine & Spirits
whitepaper.overview_p1: Fine wine and spirits (like whiskey) are great investments. Over the last 30 years, they have often made more money for investors than the stock market. But right now, buying and selling them is very hard. It costs too much money, takes too much time, and sometimes it is hard to know if the bottles are real.
whitepaper.overview_p2: ATF is a new system that connects real wine stored in secure warehouses to the digital world. We use special software called Ink Finance to manage everything safely. We turn physical bottles into digital tokens (like digital shares) that are easy to trade.
whitepaper.overview_p3: Most other companies are just websites that connect buyers and sellers. ATF is different because we actually own the wine. We are launching with $10 Million of our own high-quality wine from our partner vineyards, Chateau L'Hermitage Lescours and Chateau Mongiron.
whitepaper.problem_subtitle: Buying wine is easy, but selling it is hard.
whitepaper.problem_cost_desc: If you want to sell a wine collection today, middlemen (like auction houses) take up to 30% of your money in fees.
whitepaper.problem_slow_desc: It can take 3 to 6 months to sell your wine and get paid.
whitepaper.problem_real_desc: The wine industry loses billions of dollars every year to fakes because they still use paper receipts to prove ownership.
whitepaper.solution_subtitle: ATF fixes these problems using computer code called "Smart Contracts."
whitepaper.solution_fast_desc: You can sell your wine tokens in seconds, just like selling a stock. You don't have to wait for the bottles to be shipped.
whitepaper.solution_proof_desc: We create the digital token the moment the wine leaves the barrel. This creates a perfect digital history that cannot be faked.
whitepaper.solution_share_desc: A rare cask of whiskey can cost $100,000. Most people can't afford that. We split that cask into smaller digital shares, so more people can invest.
whitepaper.tech_subtitle: We use a mix of technologies to make sure everything is legal and safe. We use a platform called Ink Finance to run the business.
whitepaper.tech_id_desc: We use a specific type of digital token called ERC-3643. Think of this as a token with an ID card attached to it.
whitepaper.tech_id_rule_desc: You can only buy or hold this token if you have verified who you are (like showing your passport).
whitepaper.tech_id_why_desc: This keeps us legal. If someone from a banned country tries to buy the token, the system automatically says "No."
whitepaper.tech_id_safe_desc: If you lose your password (private key), we can help you get your tokens back. This is not possible with normal crypto like Bitcoin.
whitepaper.tech_wait_subtitle: Real things move slower than digital things.
whitepaper.tech_wait_problem_desc: If you ask to take your wine out of the warehouse, it takes a few days to ship.
whitepaper.tech_wait_fix_desc: We use this standard to create a "Waiting" status. It locks your request until the warehouse confirms the wine has actually moved. This keeps the digital record matching the real world perfectly.
whitepaper.tech_ink_desc: We use Ink Finance software to manage the company's money and decisions.
whitepaper.tech_ink_treasury_desc: This is a digital safe. No single person on our team can take money out alone. It requires multiple approvals to move funds.
whitepaper.tech_ink_wrap_desc: Ink Finance helps us "wrap" the legal rights to the wine into a digital package that can be traded.
whitepaper.products_title: 5. Our First Products: The $10 Million Collection
whitepaper.products_subtitle: We are starting with wine we already have. We are tokenizing the 2019, 2020, and 2021 vintages from our partner estates in Bordeaux, France.
whitepaper.products_2019_desc: This wine is almost ready to drink. We expect people to trade this one a lot.
whitepaper.products_2020_desc: This was a famous year for weather and quality. This is for investors who want to hold it for 10+ years to see it grow in value.
whitepaper.products_2021_desc: A classic year with a lower starting price. This is a good entry point for new investors.
whitepaper.products_legal_subtitle: To make sure you really own the wine, we use two layers of law:
whitepaper.products_legal_fr_desc: We register a legal claim on the physical bottles in the warehouse. This means the wine cannot be moved unless the token owners agree.
whitepaper.products_legal_bvi_desc: We set up a company here that issues the tokens. This company holds the legal rights to the wine in France.
whitepaper.money_subtitle: ATF makes money in four ways:
whitepaper.roadmap_p1_action_desc: We will turn $50,000 of wine into tokens to make sure the "ID Checker" and the "Digital Safe" work correctly.
whitepaper.roadmap_p2_action_desc: We will release the $10 Million Collection from Chateau L'Hermitage Lescours and Chateau Mongiron. We will invite approved investors to start buying and trading.
whitepaper.roadmap_p3_action_desc: We will start adding whiskey from Scotland and Japan. We will also let people borrow money against their wine tokens without having to sell them.
whitepaper.safety_legal_desc: We use strict ID checks so we never break the law. We know exactly who owns every token.
whitepaper.safety_storage_desc: All wine is stored in professional "Bonded Warehouses" (secure, tax-free zones). We use smart thermometers that record the temperature to the blockchain, so you know the wine was never spoiled by heat.
whitepaper.safety_money_desc: We use Ink Finance's "Smart Safe" (Treasury). This holds the money in a way that protects investors from theft or bad management.
whitepaper.footer_locations: Hong Kong | British Virgin Islands | Bordeaux

founders.title: Founded by Industry Veterans
founders.subtitle: Built on decades of proven success in technology and finance
founders.description_prefix: Leveraging their proven track record from building and successfully exiting
founders.description_suffix: , our founders bring unparalleled expertise in scaling technology platforms to millions of users and navigating complex international markets.
founders.quote: "We're bringing the same level of innovation and scale that built internet giants to the emerging world of tokenized real-world assets. Our focus on premium alcohol and tobacco creates a unique bridge between traditional luxury markets and blockchain technology."
